# Git

Git is a [202110161030](202110161030.md) and [202110161031](202110161031.md) #[202208131616](202208131616.md) that was
developed by Linus Torvalds, who is also the creator of [202204081225](202204081225.md), and
now maintained by the community. The repository can be hosted on various
provider such as GitHub and GitLab.

Git has various functionalities and characteristics:

- [202204261123](202204261123.md)#
- [202204261122](202204261122.md)#
- [202205251612](202205251612.md)#
- [202204262031](202204262031.md)#
- [202205251600](202205251600.md)#
- [202204261212](202204261212.md)#
- [202204261452](202204261452.md)#

- [202204261252](202204261252.md)#
- [202205251604](202205251604.md)#
